HomePage.metaDescription: Personal website of Teddy Setiady, a Full Stack Developer from Medan, Indonesia.
HomePage.title: Hello, I'm Teddy Setiady
HomePage.titleDesc: Full Stack Developer | Turning Ideas into Reality
HomePage.desc: I am a full stack developer from Medan, North Sumatra. With 3 years of experience building innovative web applications and extensive expertise in the latest technologies, I am ready to help you achieve your digital goals.
HomePage.workExperienceDesc: My experience is in the industrial field

Kerja.title: MBE Towing
desc: Designed and managed digital strategies, including SEO, SEM, and advertising campaigns on the website using Google Ads.
Optimized advertisements that increased ROI by up to 200% within one year.
Drafted formal company letters and business partnership documents, including tailored proposals to meet specific business needs.
Managed the creation, maintenance, and updates of the company website, ensuring that articles were regularly uploaded to improve SEO.

About.metaTitle: About Teddy Setiady - Full Stack Developer
About.metaDescription: Learn more about Teddy Setiady, a Full Stack Developer with 3 years of experience in web development.
About.title: About Me
About.desc1: My name is Teddy Setiady, I am a full stack developer from Medan, North Sumatra.
About.desc2: Having a high interest in the world of technology since junior high school, I started learning the basics of programming in 2014. I managed to win third place in a robotics competition held in 2017 at the city level.
About.desc3: With over 3 years of experience, I have successfully built various complex web and mobile applications for several companies and educational foundations in Medan.
About.desc4: Furthermore, I also have expertise in creating Arduino-based devices and can determine the hardware and sensor requirements according to client requests. Not only programming skills, I also have SEO optimization capabilities and can run Google Ads campaigns.
About.desc5: I believe that technology can be used to make positive changes, and I am very enthusiastic about collaborating on exciting projects.

Project.metaDescription: Explore the projects developed by Teddy Setiady, including web applications and Arduino-based devices.
Project.title: Projects
Project.titleDesc: Here are some projects I have worked on

proyek.title: Portfolio
proyek.description: My personal website to showcase my experience and the projects I have worked on.

proyek.title: Android App and Job Alert Website
proyek.description: A job alert information system through an Android application. It receives data via notifications even when the device is in doze mode.

proyek.title: E-LKPD CHEMISTRY
proyek.description: A website used for learning chemistry for vocational students, making it more interactive and easier.

proyek.title: Wastewater Monitoring Website
proyek.description: A wastewater monitoring system with several sensor parameters. It displays real-time data in the form of charts and offers user access at 3 levels to view the data.

proyek.title: Automatic Gallon Filling System Based on Internet Of Things
proyek.description: An IoT-based gallon filling system using ESP 8266, weight and ultrasonic sensors as parameters, and a 5V pump as the output. The application has an admin feature to track water usage and income based on the number of gallons filled.

proyek.title: Joint Savings
proyek.description: This system is designed to support the administration of joint savings at a boarding school.
